TEI.2.document_title: J. Thomas to Stephen F. Austin, 12-01-1823

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 712

div1.p: The bearer Mr John Hall desiring to go into your part of the country has requested of me a letter. Mr Hall is a man of respectable parentage and connexion in this parish—and is himself so far as I am acquainted with him a man of respectability and enterprise.
